apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji captures a loving kiss between two men, with one featuring a light skin tone and the other a medium-dark skin tone, in a design that emphasizes warmth and affection. Their faces are depicted with subtle, realistic lighting and soft, rounded edges, highlighting the tender moment with Apple's characteristic 3D depth and glossy finish. This emoji is a beautiful and inclusive representation of romantic love and commitment, frequently used to express deep affection and partnership.
